# Edward Wadley House

| locmapin    = Utah#USA
| built       = 1893
| builder     = Wadley, William
| added       = June 9, 1987
| area        =
| mpsub       =
| refnum      = 87000832
}}
The Edward Wadley House at 2445 N. Canyon Rd. in Pleasant Grove, Utah was built in 1893.  It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1987.
It was built of soft rock.
